title: Feedback and May be a Bug in SKT T1 Kalista Skin

embed.description: This is a teaser spotlight of SKT Kalista with ingame gameplay! Skin name is CONFIRMED as SKT Kalista, particles & SFX may not be final. Check out the other skins in this cycle. Full Skin Spotlight will be released in the near future which will go more indepth.

body: I just want to tell U something about SKT T1 Kalista skin. I know that I am not a pbe player but please consider my opinion as I saw a lot of pbe players playing with her. The thing is that this skin has a yellow/gold particles and it is so good but the passive of Kalista W when she hits someone or her ally hits the passive procs in green as her default skin. Can't U make it proc in yellow like her spears and everything else. Also when they use runnans hurricane the extra spears are green not yellow like the real ones so please consider these bugs please. Another thing to notice that this Skin has no SKT T1 icon neither in the outfit nor in any ability animation and thanks in advance.

replies.body:
Hey XxBLACKD00MxX - 

Thanks for the report! 

This has since been resolved. the particles are now yellow/blue. At the time this video was taken, there was still some particle work being done. :)
